={
  "body": "AnotaÃ§Ãµes deixadas por {{ $item("0").$node["Webhook"].json["body"]["prospection"]["salesman"]["name"] }} na Meetime:\n{{ 
(() => {
  const text = $item("0").$node["Webhook"].json["body"]["prospection"]["lead"]["annotations"];
  
  // Decodificar caracteres especiais
  let cleaned = text
    .replace(/–/g, 'â€“')
    .replace(/í/g, 'Ã­')
    .replace(/ç/g, 'Ã§')
    .replace(/ã/g, 'Ã£')
    .replace(/õ/g, 'Ãµ')
    .replace(/á/g, 'Ã¡')
    .replace(/é/g, 'Ã©')
    .replace(/ó/g, 'Ã³')
    .replace(/ú/g, 'Ãº')
    .replace(/ê/g, 'Ãª')
    .replace(/ô/g, 'Ã´')
    .replace(/&/g, '&')
    .replace(/ /g, ' ')
    .replace(/É/g, 'Ã‰');

  // Usar um placeholder temporÃ¡rio para quebras de linha
  cleaned = cleaned
    .replace(/<br\s*\/?>\s*/gi, '###BREAK###')
    .replace(/<br\s*\/?>/gi, '###BREAK###')
    .replace(/<h[1-6][^>]*>/gi, '###BREAK###')
    .replace(/<\/h[1-6]>/gi, '###BREAK###')
    .replace(/<p[^>]*>/gi, '###BREAK###')
    .replace(/<\/p>/gi, '###BREAK###')
    .replace(/<div[^>]*>/gi, '###BREAK###')
    .replace(/<\/div>/gi, '###BREAK###')
    .replace(/<ul[^>]*>/gi, '###BREAK###')
    .replace(/<\/ul>/gi, '###BREAK###')
    .replace(/<li[^>]*>/gi, '###BREAK###â€¢ ')
    .replace(/<\/li>/gi, '###BREAK###')
    .replace(/<hr[^>]*>/gi, '###BREAK###---###BREAK###')
    .replace(/<[^>]*>/g, ' ')
    .replace(/[ ]+/g, ' ')
    .replace(/ ###BREAK###/g, '###BREAK###')
    .replace(/###BREAK### /g, '###BREAK###')
    .trim();

  // Processar emojis e pontuaÃ§Ã£o
  cleaned = cleaned
    .replace(/(ðŸ”Ž|ðŸ§©|ðŸŽ¯|ðŸ’¡|ðŸ¤”|ðŸ“…)/g, '###BREAK###$1')
    .replace(/\s*\.\s*/g, '. ')
    .replace(/\s*,\s*/g, ', ')
    .replace(/\s*:\s*/g, ': ');

  // Limpar formataÃ§Ã£o final e substituir placeholder por \n
  cleaned = cleaned
    .replace(/###BREAK###\s*###BREAK###/g, '\\n\\n')
    .replace(/###BREAK###{3,}/g, '\\n\\n')
    .replace(/###BREAK###/g, '\\n')
    .replace(/\\n\s*\\n/g, '\\n\\n')
    .replace(/\\n{3,}/g, '\\n\\n');

  return cleaned;
})()
}}"
}
